attributes.additional_details:
The NHS carries out over 200,000 abortions a year. Abortion is the gravest mass human rights abuse of our time. Taxpayers should not be paying for the mass killing of the most vulnerable.

Stand with your fellow citizens to call for the end of the forced taxpayer funding of abortions as well as for any other entity that engages in, or facilitates, the killing of preborn children.

We urgently need to shift public opinion on the killing of preborn children and defend the rights of these most vulnerable among us.
attributes.background: End taxpayer funded abortions carried out by the NHS.

rejection.details:
Decisions on the funding of abortions is a matter for individual NHS trusts, operating within the law on permitted treatments. 

You could start a petition calling for the Government to introduce new restrictions on when people can access abortion services, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
